income_messages:
From: s***********3@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-25 17:14:22
SUBJECT:   NOTIFICATION OF CREDIT FROM 
  NOTIFICATION OF CREDIT FROM  BANCO SANTANDER
Dear Sir
We have this 24th day of April, 2023, received again  payment credit
instruction from the United Nations and World bank to credit your account
with your compensation funds allocated in your name to the tune of
US$2,000,000.00, (Two million United States Dollars) from their reserve
accounts with us. However, you shall require re-confirming the following
details as specified below to affect the transfer aforementioned above to
your designated account details through our Bank Manager's email contact as
he is waiting to hear from you, Name: Martinez Gomez , Email:(
martinezgomez@stdeesp.com
) :
{1}. Your Full Name and Address.
{2}. Your Confidential Tel, Cell and Fax.
{3). Your Bank name and address.
{4). Your A/c Name and A/c Numbers.
(5). Your Swift Code / Routing Numbers.
Please do provide the above information accurately, because this office
cannot afford to be held liable for any wrong transfer of funds or
liability of funds credited into a ghost account.
Thanks for banking with us while we looking forward to serve you.
Regards,
Ahmed Bello Jose.
(Assistant Director of Foreign Operations, Banco Santander(Prudente),
Alcala Branch, Madrid
Spain.)   
From: s***********3@gmail.com
To: bw19630@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-27 15:13:46
SUBJECT: Re: NOTIFICATION OF CREDIT FROM
forwarded:from martinezgomez@stdeesp.com
Dear Marilyn,
Thanks for your message address to my staff Ahmed Bello Jose, it is well noted.
This money is a World Bank compensation for few individuals that won
lotto in Europe unknowingly that a company used their extracted
emails, they won but were not contacted which you are one of them.
I will advise you to open an "Euro Account" with us in this branch,
thereafter, we will lodge in the $2,000,000.00 World Bank compensation
into your EURO ACCOUNT, then,send you the access information of the
online bank account and an ATM CARD that you can be using to withdraw
money over there in your country at any ATM machine around you,
actually, the card can only give you 980eur every day but you can make
transfer to your local bank account up to maximum of $50,000 per week.
To open your account, we need these from you:
1. A Valid Identification Copy of you.
2. Your Address, phone number.
3. A minimum of 250eur as initial deposit which is going to be
credited into your account, to get it running before lodging a BANK
DRAFT of $2,000,000.00 into it.
4. Account Mandate (Optional).
Once your account is ready, we are going to issue and send your ATM
CARD to your address.The parcel will contain your PIN CODE for the ATM
CARD and you can change the PIN CODE once you receive the parcel at
your address and change it to your secret FOUR PIN CODE that you can
remember easily through any ATM MACHINE around you too.
Thanks for your understanding as we wait to hear from you.
Regards,
Martinez Gomez.
( BANK MANAGER, BANCO SANTANDER,ALCALA BRANCH,MADRID ESPANA.
CC: Ahmed Bello Jose.
outbound_messages:
From: bw19630@l******s.email
To: s***********3@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-25 17:14:32
SUBJECT: Re:   NOTIFICATION OF CREDIT FROM 
Dear Ahmed Bello Jose,
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the credit from Banco Santander. I am interested in learning more about this opportunity. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please provide me with more details about the payment credit from the United Nations and World Bank? How was I selected to receive this credit? What is the purpose of the funds allocated in my name? 
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you.
Best wishes,
Marilyn
From: bw19630@l******s.email
To: s***********3@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-27 17:12:52
SUBJECT: Re: NOTIFICATION OF CREDIT FROM
Dear Martinez Gomez,
Thank you for your message regarding the World Bank and the lotto winnings. I am interested in learning more about this opportunity. Can you please provide more information about the process of opening an Euro Account with your branch? Also, can you clarify the maximum amount that can be transferred to my local bank account per week? 
Additionally, I would like to know more about the security measures in place for the online bank account and the ATM card. How can I ensure that my personal information and funds are protected? 
Thank you for your time and assistance.
Best wishes,
Marilyn
From: bw19630@l******s.email
To: s***********3@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-28 11:12:22
SUBJECT: Re: NOTIFICATION OF CREDIT FROM
Dear Martinez Gomez,
Thank you for your message. I appreciate your interest in opening an account for me. However, I am a bit hesitant to provide my personal information and make a deposit without fully understanding the terms and conditions of the account. Can you please provide more details about the account, such as the interest rate, fees, and any other requirements? Also, can you please clarify what you mean by "Valid Copy of you"? 
Thank you for your time and assistance.
Best wishes,
Marilyn
